lead_paragraph: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez appears to have unwittingly taken a leaf out of the book of his club's arch-rivals Barcelona by appointing Zinedine Zidane as coach.

headline.print_headline: Real Take Leaf Out of Barca's Book With Zidane Appointment
headline.main: Real Take Leaf Out of Barca's Book With Zidane Appointment

snippet: Real Madrid president Florentino Perez appears to have unwittingly taken a leaf out of the book of his club's arch-rivals Barcelona by appointing Zinedine Zidane as coach....
